memberdef.name: FOR_K
memberdef.initializer: for (size_t k=0, idx=0; k < size; k++)

memberdef.name: _REORDER_BODY_
memberdef.initializer: FOR_K() \ for (size_t j = 0; j < size; j++) \ for (size_t i = 0; i < size; i++, idx++) { \ __VA_ARGS__ \ }

memberdef.name: _MAKE_REORDER_
memberdef.initializer: template <typename F> \ __MAYBE_GLOBAL__ \ void reorder(reorder_proxy< F, _enum > p, \ size_t size, \ F* to, \ F* from) { \ _REORDER_BODY_(__VA_ARGS__) \ }
